content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the district court in ljubljana the case involved two expartners and the division of two pieces of real estate the plaintiff was responsible for paying the costs of the procedure which lasted for 11 months and 3 days the court decision made on october 30 2018 stated that the plaintiff is entitled to onethird of the value of the real estate while the defendant is entitled to twothirds additionally the plaintiff is required to pay 50000 eur in procedure costs the case was based on the marriage family relations act and the civil procedure code but specific sections of these laws were not mentioned in the text the text also briefly mentions section 163 which is related to costs but no further information is provided
